companies.name: SaleSpots

companies.descriptionTech: At Salespots I was responsible for the whole front end architecture of the application: ReactJS, (AngularJS and Ionic legacy), making sure the application is PWA, fully responsive, accessible and scalable. When not touching in front end I was helping back end with Lambda, DynamoDB and others AWS services
